name: Sun & Ski Inn and Suites

reviews.text: I was a little worried about this place before checking in. We needed a room for one night for a ski trip and this was the only property available for less then 150.00/nt that looked even half-way decent. After Check-in I realized that this was all needed. We reserved a Riverside Superior room for 123.00/nt, because it seemed like a little more space. The room was quite large at about 400 sqaure feet, and had a patio looking out at the river. The room wasnt luxurious by any stretch, but it was clean and came with most amenities a person would need, including a refridgerator. I would suggest getting this room because it was only about 7.00 to 10.00 more per night then the economey or standard rooms, and it looked considerably larger. The lodge came with a indoor heated pool, and enclosed outdoor jacuzzi. They were both decent, and we had the place to ourselves, so it was quite pleasant. Stowe Mountain is about 5 mins up the road and is a very easy drive. There are also several nice restaurants close by, and quite a few areas for ski rentals.

reviews.text: every summer at the Sun and Ski Motel in Stowe, Vermont for over ten years. We have been accompanied at times by our children and grandchildren as well and all of us have gone back to Florida relaxed and happy. The staff is outstanding, rooms are clean and comfortable, breakfasts are delightful. I could praise this place even more but I do NOT want to see hordes of tourists descending on my very special place! We're heading back again this summer and can't wait to get there!

We would not stay there again. The bed was hard as a rock, dipping in the middle with flat pilliows. The wallpaper was peeling off in several places in the room. There was even a light plate missing from a receptable behind the bed. The night clerk was not willing to relocate us to a better room and was not very friendly at all. We booked this place due the nice website, but guess pictures do not show the complete package. Next year we will stay elsewhere.

description: Bordered by the Little River and shadowed by Mount Mansfield, Sun & Ski Inn and Suites offers comfortable lodging rooms and amenities for the best vacation. Experience the enrichment of a peaceful mountain setting as well as the excitement of being near the fun! Located between the historic village of Stowe, Vermont and the mountain, Sun & Ski Inn and Suites has something to offer to the skiers, hikers and mountainbikers as well as to those longing for the famous New England warmth and hospitality.
